# RSA Key to PEM

# install

    $ cpanm -n Crypt::OpenSSL::RSA Crypt::OpenSSL::Bignum

# prepare

    $ openssl genrsa -out rsa_priv.pem 2048
    $ openssl rsa -in rsa_priv.pem -pubout -out rsa_pub.pem


# rsa_public_key_to_pem.pl 

perl rsa_public_key_to_pem.pl [dst_pem_filename] [n] [e]

    $ openssl rsa -text -pubin -in rsa_pub.pem

    $ perl rsa_public_key_to_pem.pl rsa_pub_export.pem  10001

    $ diff rsa_pub.pem rsa_pub_export.pem

# rsa_private_key_to_pem.pl

perl rsa_private_key_to_pem.pl [dst_pem_filename] [n] [e] [d] [p] [q]

    $ openssl rsa -text  -in rsa_priv.pem

    $ perl rsa_private_key_to_pem.pl rsa_priv_export.pem  10001  fd62b3738fe1a21d74aa600b968ced5161f10adc90423aafdcc176a065428fae909562b05f18e7f4b5ff2f33052d0e3bc1ce6520d31670ae6b6c15402290c23a29596fd60ecdb9dfc85e2125f2ad5b4d8e7e0d82f77b5acc79397b65ee518c6f623bff6c9543836e5674eb505fd3e3d544e94e4aa2a9ce428305e7cfbbeddb91 c7bdf73803de6b2a5192992edb058711d2201ad9e7dedf2282cba8937298394c93dc6f2f72a5b6c7cbd9e9c51a7283ec38ae3a278ab4f890fc4ceebed0570913755e234bf0813610a1c2325409c0cd131020b3efaff8d1c1275c057672c7c207588d0a367924c38a53e114730e9165262efa010770a79c1ec8161853bc5b0477
    
    $ diff rsa_priv.pem rsa_priv_export.pem
